dao.name: QRY_CASHIER_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, cashier_cod, use_sta, max_times, start_amt, def_shift_cod, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from cashier_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_CASHIER_RF_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) as cashierRfCount from cashier_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(def_shift_cod) = trim(:def_shift_cod) and trim(cashier_cod) <> trim(:cashier_cod)

dao.name: QRY_CASHIER_RF_SINGLE
dao.statement: select c.athena_id, c.hotel_cod, c.cashier_cod, s.usr_cname cashier_nam, c.use_sta, c.max_times, c.start_amt, c.def_shift_cod, c.ins_dat, c.ins_usr, c.upd_dat, c.upd_usr from cashier_rf c join hotel_rf h on c.athena_id = h.athena_id and c.hotel_cod = h.hotel_cod left join s99_user s on s.user_athena_id = h.athena_id and s.cmp_id = h.comp_cod and s.usr_id = c.cashier_cod where c.athena_id = :athena_id and trim(c.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and trim(c.cashier_cod) = trim(:cashier_cod)
